Package com.providenceuniversal.gim

The com.providenceuniversal.gim package contains all the major components of G-Instant Messenger™.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientMessage
    The ClientMessage interface, is a marker interface representing a request from the client to the server.
    ServerMessage
    The ServerMessage interface, is a marker interface representing a response from the server to the client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Authentication
    The Authentication class stores credentials to be used to login, create an account or delete an account;--based on the authenticationType assigned to the particular instance.
    ChatHistory
    The ChatHistory class stores a list of chat messages among given participants It is one of the types of ServerMessage.
    ChatHistoryRequest
    The ChatHistoryRequest class stores a list of participants to be used to retrieve the chat history between the participants.
    ChatMessage
    The ChatMessage class represents a single chat message between a given sender and recipient.
    Client
    The Client class is half of the core of G-Instant Messenger™ (aside Server class).
    CommitMessage
    The CommitMessage class represents a message notifying the client that the non-query requests to the server have been successful.
    ContactList
    The ContactList class stores a list of all the users of G-Instant Messenger, and indicates their activity status.
    ContactsRequest
    The ContactRequest class represents a request for the user list from the server and is used as such.
    Server
    The Server class is half of the core of G-Instant Messenger™ (aside Client class).
    ServerError
    The ServerError class represents a message notifying the client that an error has occurred processing a request.
    User
    The User represents a user of G-Instant Messenger™ and it stores the user details of the user.
    UserDisconnection
    The UserDisconnection class represents a user logout request from the server and is used as such.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Authentication.Type
    Enumeration which stores, the types of Authentication

Package com.providenceuniversal.gim Description

The com.providenceuniversal.gim package contains all the major components of G-Instant Messenger™. It contains the different classes representing the client, server, client requests, and server responses.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Garikai Gumbo
Providence Universal Studios®
